oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Selected Journals on Communist History / Selected Thematic Issues on Communist History in General History Journals, 2015-2017 / Selected articles, 2015-2016 / Calls for Papers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: -, Editors
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unfortunately, we had to cancel our annual article bibliography due to the immense workload it requires. Instead, we present you with a list of periodicals directly related to Communist studies, and a selection of thematic issues on the history of communism in general history journals from 2015-2016, as well as a list of selected articles sent in by INCS readers and correspondents. Our extensive list of general history journals where one can find regular contributions on communist history will be placed on the INCS homepage, in order to be updated regularly.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: The International Newsletter of Communist Studies; Vol 22/23, No 29-30 (2016/2017); 201-215
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Copyright (c) 2017 The International Newsletter of Communist Studies
